channel.title: Quest stage will not save?

item.title: Quest stage will not save?
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Could not find "savegame(true);

savegame = true? Lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2009, 06:37:20 pm[/size][hr]Couldn’t find that, either…I have other quests that save…(That where on here.) [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2009, 06:42:04 pm[/size][hr]Nvm, figured it out. Lol. Thanks!

                  q5stage = 1;
                  savemoreinfo();

item.title: Quest stage will not save?
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

case 405: //player talking, going to get sword sendFrame200(974, 588); sendFrame126(playerName, 975); sendFrame126("Alright, I'll go get your sword and", 976); sendFrame126("find out what I can!", 977); sendFrame185(974); sendFrame164(973); NpcDialogueSend = true; q5stage = 1; break;

So…After that dialogue it should make quest 5 stage 1, right? Well…It does…But when I log out and back in…It goes back to stage 0? Any help?

Read full topic
